"Wallace": "I used to be part of a recon unit, and we'd go alllll over Retem..."
"But with the City being so low on manpower, I've been reassigned to defend it. Now I spend all my time on guard up here admiring the view."
"Retem is a harsh place, full of harsh battles. But it still has plenty of beauty to see."
"Think you could go scope out one of my old favorite spots?"
"While you're out there, send me some image data. I wanna relive the feeling a little."
"I'll send you the exact coordinates. I really appreciate this."
